name: All India Muslim Youth Majlis
briefDescription: All India Muslim Youth Majlis is a unique and un-parallel socio cultural organisation of Minorities and Poor Classes Youth belonging to the state of Bihar, in particular and other parts of the Indian sub continent in general, situated in Patna, the Capital of Bihar (India). It came into existannce in the year 1988. All India Muslim Youth Majlis is a Registered Non Governmental Organisation(NGO) having FCRA Registration for collecting Foreign Fund for his socio, economic & cultural development. Income Tax Department has granted 12AA certificate for the specific Tax rebate to the All India Muslim Youth Majlis.
